title: BRIEF-Cognizant And A Consortium Of Indian Life Insurers Announced That They Have Developed A Blockchain Solution To Facilitate Cross-Company Data-Sharing
text:
Market News April 16, 2018 / 4:05 AM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-Cognizant And A Consortium Of Indian Life Insurers Announced That They Have Developed A Blockchain Solution To Facilitate Cross-Company Data-Sharing Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 16 (Reuters) - Cognizant Technology Solutions Corp : 
* COGNIZANT AND A CONSORTIUM OF INDIAN LIFE INSURERS ANNOUNCED THAT THEY HAVE DEVELOPED A BLOCKCHAIN SOLUTION TO FACILITATE CROSS-COMPANY DATA-SHARING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
